content.en: Optimizing Truss Structures: The Teaching-Learning-Based Optimization (TLBO) algorithm is being investigated in various studies to determine its effectiveness in optimizing truss structures. Researchers are exploring whether TLBO can solve problems related to truss shape and size optimization, weight minimization, discrete design variables, combined size and shape optimization, and more. Additionally, modified versions of TLBO, such as the Modified subpopulation teaching-learning-based optimization (MS-TLBO) algorithm and the Modified teaching-learning-based optimization (MTLBO) algorithm, are also being examined for their potential in optimizing truss structures.
content.da: Optimering af gitterstrukturer: Undervisnings- og læringsbaseret optimering (TLBO) algoritmen undersøges i forskellige studier for at fastslå dens effektivitet i at optimere gitterstrukturer. Forskere udforsker om TLBO kan løse problemer relateret til optimering af gitterform og størrelse, vægtminimering, diskrete designvariabler, kombineret størrelse- og formoptimering, og mere. Derudover undersøges også modificerede versioner af TLBO, såsom Modified subpopulation teaching-learning-based optimization (MS-TLBO) algoritmen og Modified teaching-learning-based optimization (MTLBO) algoritmen, for deres potentiale i at optimere gitterstrukturer.
